website_summaries.verdict: A feature-packed massage pillow that helps relieve muscle pain and tension with heat and shiatsu style massage.
pros: Features 4 3D massage nodules that change direction every minute
Uses infrared heat to loosen muscles and relieve pain
Auto shutoff turns the pillow off after 15 minutes
cons: Must be plugged into an outlet for operation, though the cord is fairly long

customer_reviews.title: Very effective and well designed
customer_reviews.text: This is a really well designed massager! I have had a similar one for years and it works really well for tension in the traps, shoulder blades, and neck. It also works well for calves and feet. It works so well that my son keeps taking mine so I bought him this one instead. This model is really cool because it has the same knobs with strong massaging action but it is thinner and lighter than the one I bought a few years ago. Great way to relieve tension and stress!!
customer_reviews.author: Chel

customer_reviews.title: Who doesn't love a massager
customer_reviews.text: Really like this massager and it's features you can have heat or no heat, change the speed or even the direction of the massage knobs, has velcro so u can strap it to anything like the seat of a car comes with car plug attachment also, and the clothe that covers it can be removed for washing which is a real plus. Definitely would recommend this to anyone. Note u can't change the heat settings its preset.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley M.

customer_reviews.title: My husband loves it!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My husband is working 12 hours a day sitting in front of the computer! Every day he is complaining about back and legs pain So I decided to order first this small massager to see if it can help I received it Friday, and my husband didn’t leave it!!! He used it all weekend long! Before sleeping, in the car and today installed it in the office. It is really easy to use and the price is great! My husband used it in the low mode... It is also small so easy to storage. You can put it even in the nightstand!
customer_reviews.author: Roe

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied Customer
customer_reviews.text: After speaking with the seller regarding this product, they were able to send me a new adapter cord for the massage pillow. I am very happy with this purchase! The heat is perfect and the deep tissue kneading feels good on my neck and shoulders. Camille was great and was able to assist with the order in a timely mattering. 😊
customer_reviews.author: S. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great massager
customer_reviews.text: I loveeeee this product. I work at a place where I have to stand a lot and after a long day this massager gives me such a relief to my foot. You can also use this for your back, neck, and waist as well. Also, it comes with a plug for your car as well. So you can easily use it when you are in your car. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Shay

customer_reviews.title: Not easy to find a good position for massage
customer_reviews.text: The product is good, but I think it is too high and hard. I found it very difficult to put it in a comfortable position for a neck massage. I have tried on the bed, on the chair, on the couch, and on the floor. None of them was easy to find a comfortable position if found. Though, it is good for a foot massage even though it is not the main purpose. Due to all efforts to make it work with a pleasable massage, I ended up returning the product.
customer_reviews.author: Rafael Navarro

customer_reviews.title: Broke in under 1 week
customer_reviews.text: I am so upset about this. Mine broke within the first week doesn’t work at all. It was hard at first because trying to lean on it for your back the two cords would always separate they didn’t fit tight enough so you were constantly trying to put the cords back together. Then the whole thing just broke literally within six days. Huge disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Good massager, cover torn within 2 weeks
customer_reviews.text: Great little massager. However, just two weeks after starting to use this, the fabric cover is already torn. Soon I don’t think I will be able to use it anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Dont bother
customer_reviews.text: Come unplugged all the time... dishonest seller!! Promised refund I never got. Returning asap
customer_reviews.author: jacob burkett

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed I suffer from back pain ever sense I had a car accident 15year ago. I hurt my back and neck. I have own a few of these massagers but this one really works. What I like about this one is that it’s small and you can move it up or down it’s very convenient my neck feels less stiff I use it almost every day it’s my favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer velasquez

customer_reviews.title: Too rough on me.
customer_reviews.text: The moving parts that are underneath the top fabric, the turning spheres that do the massage actually hurt me. They are hard and solid - like marble with no "give". It feels like I'm being massaged with rocks. It would be perfect if those parts were made of a hard, stiff rubber (remember those old "super balls", that would rocket up in the air when you slammed them down on the street?) They were hard, but they were rubber. The only way I can use this device if by laying it on TOP of me. I cannot lay back with it behind my neck or back.
customer_reviews.author: Dukeman

customer_reviews.title: Relaxing
customer_reviews.text: This thing is really relaxing. As per description said that it’s for neck and back but actually my wife use it on foot and legs since her legs getting cramps due to pregnancy. It came with car adapter but probably will not able to use it because my wife already using it most of the time so might just buy another one for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Romano

customer_reviews.title: i absolutely love it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this massager to keep at my office for when I need a quick massage and this product doesnt dissapoint. I like that it's small and I can easily store it in my desk drawer. I can also move it around depending on where I need the massage including my feet and it feels great!
customer_reviews.author: karina

customer_reviews.title: poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I gave a good review at first (below) but it ripped after a month. I did like the three speed settings. The electric connection is so hard to click into snd out of place that I cannot disconnect it if I want to use with the car attachment. The small size is an advantage in the neck area and a disadvantage in lower back area. Overall I like it and time will tell if it is dependable.
customer_reviews.author: Kiara

customer_reviews.title: Relieves my lower back pain
customer_reviews.text: After I got a massager of this type for my mom I knew I had to get one for myself! I sit and work in front of a computer a lot for school so I would get lower back pain pretty frequently. I also get them a after I do squats during workout. This device hit my lower back tensions perfectly! It has a heating option, option to slow down/speed up the massaging, and to reverse the direction of the massage. This instantly relived some of my back tension after the first time I used it so I’m pretty impressed! It is also durable and comes with a car charger so you can use it in the car
customer_reviews.author: J Ali

customer_reviews.title: No bueno.
customer_reviews.text: They really should redesign the power cord on this one. When you connect the wall plus to the power cord on the massager, it does not have a tight connection and immediately falls out. I finally had to use electrical tape to keep the power cord connected so that I didn't have to hold it together with my hands in order to even use the massager. I'm also not satisfied with the massage functions and the auto power off after such a short time period. I would have returned this if I hadn't made the mistake of throwing away the packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: When I first got this I hated it. I genuinely thought it was defective because I couldn’t get the chord to stay in. It has a changeable adapter for car or home use. I realized I didn’t have it pushed in all the way! Once I fixed that user-end ID10T error, I was in love. I hurt my back and this has been amazing. Just make sure that if you get it and the cord keeps coming loose, that you really make sure it’s plugged in well.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. & Mrs. David Rosenfield

customer_reviews.title: DANGEROUS! Weak stitching, ripped within 1month
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item back in Nov 2019 (it is Dec 2019 now). After 1 month of regular use, one of the corners started to rip open exposing everything inside. Not sure if I received a faulty item as most people hasn’t dealt with this issue yet. Threading seems to be so weak. UPDATE: (Feb 01, 2020): DANGEROUS PRODUCT!! DO NOT BUY!! I tried to use this massager even with the little rip, but then it started to rip even more and started to catch onto my shirt on my back, also ripped my skin pretty good..
customer_reviews.author: Bowie

customer_reviews.title: Its good for the price.
customer_reviews.text: It came as advertised and works well but the heating feature is kinda pointless as the friction from it rubbing against your shirt is more than enough heat, i also find i hard positioning it just right to get the spots i want cause its kinda small, i cant really put much weight on it either or it gets really uncomfortable so i kinda have to lean forward to get the right amount of pressure. Overall its good for the price but if you want a better massage experience i would spend the money and get something better but if your on a budget its a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Dbz/gt/super collector.

customer_reviews.title: Relieved my tense neck
customer_reviews.text: With working from home this past month, I have had a lot of tension in my neck and was looking for something I could use while relaxing. I love the shiatsu feature on this pillow. I used it while laying here on the couch and was so relaxed! I used the lower speed with heat for my neck. I also used it for my feet and the higher speed without heat and that was great as well. It’s like a spa experience for a fraction of the price.
customer_reviews.author: L.W.

customer_reviews.title: Great massager
customer_reviews.text: I just purchased this back massager and I have to say its pretty amazing. At first I was surprised that it is much smaller than ones I have seen but it actually is very powerful and I like that it is smaller because I can also use it on my arms namely my wrists which have tendinitis. You can also use it on your neck too! I even use it on the bottoms of my feet and it feels great!! Basically I use it everywhere I can. I am really pleased with this massager and recommend it. I love that its heated and also came with a car charger too. Great for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Apt for office chairs or car seats!
customer_reviews.text: It sure relieves the pain if you gently lean towards it to work as intended. If not, leaning too much towards the device might make it work otherwise. - They work great for both the back and the neck. - They fit perfectly both on office chairs and car seats. - The strap behind is very convenient to hook them to the seat. - The quality is great. - The additional heat feature is a plus! - This cannot be replaced over a pillow for office chairs or any kind of seat to support that sweet spot in the back.
customer_reviews.author: Yogi

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: PROS: This does a good job of massaging the lower back area when seated in a chair. I use it for my neck and shoulders which you have to get creative with pillows to prop it up and get it in the right position. CONS: I was not able to use this laying down as it would stop rotating when too much pressure is applied. It even did that while propped up on neck or back if you lean into it too much.
customer_reviews.author: rateit

customer_reviews.title: Good for your bodily aches n knots in muscles!
customer_reviews.text: I love how the shape of it allows you to use it anywhere on your body where pain relief is needed. I use it on my neck, back, legs, tummy, etc. I had other massagers but their shapes did not allow flexibility. So I really like this one! I was having really bad neck pain from using the computer too much. This has brought some relief. The only thing is I don't like how it keeps turning off. Then I have to turn it on again. I'm hoping this is not a defect. Overall, very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Blue Skies

customer_reviews.title: It's not all that good..
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how this thing got so many rave reviews. It's awkward, and a bit more painful than pain relieving.. the plug will not stay connected for nothing. I'm constantly having to move from my comfortable position to reconnect the plug. The only reason it is not 1 or less stars us because when it does stay plugged in, the warming element is relaxing. I have yet to be able to use it anything other than the small of my back due to the plug being so loose. It's about the only location it is stable enough not to move and unplug. I'd return it if I had more energy to deal with the local USPS office..
customer_reviews.author: JRO

customer_reviews.title: Works as intended
customer_reviews.text: I just received the massager 30 minutes before writing this. I opened it up immediately and put it to work. I have to say that it works very well and I was getting relief right away. The price is very reasonable as well. Anyone looking for an inexpensive shiatsu massage pillow, this one will work for many different parts of your body. 5/5 stars
customer_reviews.author: redbaron666

customer_reviews.title: Made of beautiful gray linen material that matches decor well
customer_reviews.text: I’m a serial massage product purchaser and this one is a good one! I chose this product because this one was made of good quality material (gray linen fabric) and matched my decor well. I’ve found that kneading massage products are most effective and this pillow is particularly easy to use - the controls are simple and self explanatory, which is rarer than you might think. One thing to note is that the kneading rollers will switch direction every few minutes and there is no heat function (unnecessary in my opinion).
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: 3 Months for $40...
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for three months and then I turned it on one day and the roller balls on the left didn't turn or rotate at all, and the roller balls on the right vibrated horribly. I loved it while it worked, and I guess $40 for three months of use beats paying a massage therapist that much money for 30 minutes or less. Still, I only used this while sitting at my desk chair, so it was normal use, no undue pressure... I thought it would last longer than it did and I'm disappointed that it didn't.
customer_reviews.author: SD or MA

customer_reviews.title: great value
customer_reviews.text: This is the closet thing to my homedic sm-100 which is no longer available. Realistic expectations; I am 5'8'' at 166lbs. pro; it gives a nice pressure massage to my back and neck. cons; its rotating balls don't protrude as far as my worn out homedic sm-100. This model design I have to lean back harder. I bought 4 more of these in case they become unavailable like my old homedic sm-100 which lasted me about 1 1/2 years of regular usage. Thank you for the great price and product.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Cheng

customer_reviews.title: Would Have Been 5 Star.......But NOT
customer_reviews.text: I would have loved to give this massager a 5 star review however, in less than 3 months (purchased May 8, 2020), it's making loud abnoxious noises and grinding as if it's 10 years old. I bought one prior to this one and right out the box it was loud and grinding, I got it replaced and lo and behold, it is happening again in less than 3 months of purchase. So that speaks to its poor quality. I cannot return it at this point as it's outside the return period, and have heard nothing from the seller about standing behind his/her product. Very disappointed!!!!
customer_reviews.author: BJ

customer_reviews.title: Very aggressive
customer_reviews.text: I tried it and my husband did as well. It was very aggressive for us and left us very sore. I could not use it at all and my lower back ended up bruised from it. If you like a very aggressive and very deep massage you may like it but not for me
customer_reviews.author: Nicole LoBianco

customer_reviews.title: B+ but not quite an A
customer_reviews.text: I have used it for two months now and it works well to knead my back and upper shoulders. The heat setting is great for deep heat. The two balls that are closest together are too far apart to knead my neck, as hoped, but I can do one side at a time. Two problems: First, the controls are on the front of device, which means I often accidentally turn it off when leaning back on it. Secondly, the power cord attaches in a flimsy manner so it also disconnects easily. I’ve had to tape it together to stop it from disconnecting.
customer_reviews.author: ReaderReader

customer_reviews.title: Good to use on different areas
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this little back massager. He was so excited to try it out as soon as it arrived. It is very convenient to use in different chairs or positions. My husband uses for his lower back and I use for my shoulders and neck. My only complaint is that when it is used while lying in bed it very easily and frequently comes unplugged (and thus cuts off). I think if the connector to change between the wall adapter and car adapter wasn’t so close to the back of the massager, this would help this issue.
customer_reviews.author: Anna T

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable. Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Pros: 1. Nice portable and efficient design 2. Instruction is clear on the included manual 3. Easy to setup and easy to use 4. The rotation and strength are at just the right level, very comfortable for both neck and back 5. Comes with adaptor for car power source, good for road trips Cons: 1. Would be better if it came with a bag for travel use 2. There is no control for heat on and off. It is automatic
customer_reviews.author: Al W.

customer_reviews.title: Best idea I have had in awhile!
customer_reviews.text: This just got delivered today so I can't speak to how long it will last. But I can say that I've used it on 3 different areas (neck, shoulder, and lower back) and I could not be happier. I have sciatica, and my job requires me to be at a desk during working hours. It has already loosened up my neck, and relieved pain in my hip. It does have different speed settings, and an auto shut off. Which is probably a good thing or I would leave it on all day. I have not had any issues with the cord coming unplugged while using this so far. I would definitely recommend this to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: kyoung

customer_reviews.title: perfect whole body massager, surprisingly good for calf muslces
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a replacement for my broken Brookstone massager which has served me over 2 years. It has a good heating function and speed control that my old Brookstone does not have. I know that it's built as a neck massager but it loses my calf muscle exceptionally. The manufacturing quality is not shy of Brookstone and the material feels heavy duty which should last for a long time. It also came with a car charger, haven't tried it but it is a very thoughtful touch. The only drawback is the size of this massager, may not cover your whole back if you have a wide back.
customer_reviews.author: Fengtian Wang

customer_reviews.title: broke in less than 6 weeks
customer_reviews.text: this massager had it's fabric cover rip within the 1st 6 weeks of usage and wrapped up in the massage bulbs. it is no longer usable and I have not gotten a response from this vendor. there are lots of massager options like this, definitely choose another option.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Best massage pillow ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is hands down the best massage pillow I have ever used! It really feels like a deep message and the heat is a bonus. It works great on muscle knots in the back also. This massage pillow is compact and lightweight, and it comes with an AC adapter and a car adapter which is great because I am definitely going to use it at this summer’s road trip. I recommend this product to all and it is great and well worth it so everyone go get you one it will not disappoint you.
customer_reviews.author: Prime_Lord

customer_reviews.title: great for the a sore lower back
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my wife when her back was tweaked with Covid 19 she has not been able to get a massage and this really has helped her lower back. Its easy to use with several different settings for heat or not and you can adjust the speed that the unit kneeds your back. The unit can strap to a chair to keep it in place. It has an adapter for the car as well which was a nice surprise. I would recommend this massager.
customer_reviews.author: A.K. W.

customer_reviews.title: Work Great
customer_reviews.text: I am office man so always seat in office all day long. I feel my back and shoulder blades as he often gets very tight muscles and knots that's why I did some research and bought this try to release my issues. This massager are designed perfectly for the back, neck even shoulders and legs and provide a deep and intense Shiatsu massage, which is exactly what I had been looking for. I am very enjoying and using it every day after work with my family time.
customer_reviews.author: Enyuan Shih

customer_reviews.title: The best neck and shoulder pain reliever
customer_reviews.text: I have issue for my neck and shoulders after working for hours. I was asking someone to do massage or went to massagist 🤦‍♂️. it is so expensive to visit frequently. But now i solved 💁‍♂️ With my new massager at home. Easy pissy to use and road md rotation balls really works my shoulders and necks to relief pain. Just for improvement, i have ideas 💡 1. Manage the space that between the 2 side of balls. Bc everyone’s body is different. 2. Do not change rotation until change by own self.
customer_reviews.author: Erkhembayar Bayart

customer_reviews.title: Compact and effective little back massager
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I've been very pleased with this little unit. I often suffer from a sore lower back, usually due to poor posture from sitting at work. This unit is easy to setup behind my lower back while sitting on the sofa. It will knead away for 15 minutes on the automatic time and it does make a lot of difference. While not enough to knock a star off, I would have liked a little more heat. It gets noticeably warm when it action, but I'm not convinced that it puts out enough heat to make much of a contribution.
customer_reviews.author: A Texan 2Top Contributor: Cycling

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend
customer_reviews.text: This helps with pain relief. I feel it is good quality and I recommend. This does deep tissue massage and what I mean by that is if you use it for very long it starts to hurt and feels like it may bruise. I only wish there was a lighter option than is available. However we use for short periods of time to work out stress knots and tension and it is good for that. But be prepared that this is not one you can just keep on you for prolonged period of time. I like the heat and the product is very good quality.
customer_reviews.author: RB

customer_reviews.title: Papillon Back Massager with Heat,Shiatsu Back and Neck Massager
customer_reviews.text: We have had one of these in a different brand for 15 years til it wore out; this is a replacement. We like this model very much it is versatile and the Heat feature is an added bonus. It is light weight and easy to place just where you want it on your body. The auto reverse feature is sometimes annoying because of its short interval; I would recommend they make that feature optional or variable in future improvements.
customer_reviews.author: K Fitzgibbons

customer_reviews.title: Uhm, yes I Like It
customer_reviews.text: It arrived earlier than I thought. It's not as big as I thought it would be. It's very compact so you can easily use it a work and in the car. I used it for 15 minutes. I wish the pressure was harder. I need it for lower back, but in all the other spots: neck, head, shoulder--it felt great. So far I like it but hopefully after several uses I will grow to love it. I would buy again and I would gift to a friend. Until Covid 19 passes, this could help with those much needed massages.
customer_reviews.author: kioki watanabe

customer_reviews.title: Don't try to hold a conversation while using this. :)
customer_reviews.text: I was talking to my daughter and put this behind me to message my upper back and suddenly nothing around me mattered but this little miracle. I held my hand up for her to just stop talking because there was no way I could pay attention. I don't understand how such a little thing could dig into my sore muscles to get the knots out. I almost deducted a star because it's sometimes tough to hold in place. But it wasn't that big of a deal. I can't vouch for it's durability because I have not had it long enough but so far I love it!
customer_reviews.author: The original backroads

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Pros: 1. Affordable 2. Compact 3. Portable 4. Great for relieving tension built up during the day 5. Soothing Cons: 1. Too painful to use while lying down on it. Best to use while sitting down or lie facing down with massager on the back 2. Power plug connection to massager wire comes off pretty easily Was skeptical when we ordered it but my husband loves this so much and we use it almost every night before sleeping. Great purchase for those who don't want to splurge on a massage chair etc.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cord connector annoying but works out my knots well.
customer_reviews.text: I had back surgery 6 months ago and I constantly get knots in my lower back/love handle/butt cheek area. I am able to set this up at different angles using my couch and pillows to get the problem spots. My only complaint is how the actual device plugs into the power cord. The cord constantly disconnects while i am trying to adjust it. Now I just find my spot and then connect the cord. Overall I really like it. I needed something kind of rough to work my knots out and it does.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Five star product!
customer_reviews.text: The Papillon Back Massager with Heat is a very high quality product. For our family it is a life saver. As advertised the massager can be used on every part of the body. - back, neck, thighs, feet, etc. My wife has severe arthritis and extensive nerve damage. The massager provides her relief on a daily basis. I ordered a 2nd unit as a backup. I would not want her to be without the massager for even a day. I also plan to gift immediate family members with one of these massagers. Thank you Papillon!
customer_reviews.author: Happy person

customer_reviews.title: Awesome buy.
customer_reviews.text: I do a lot of weight training, for the past 2 weeks my neck and shoulders have been suffering from it. I decided to give this product a chance after thorough Amazon reviewing. Got it in today quickly hooked it up with the handy looong cord and within 15 minutes (I am not playing) I could turn my head with ease!!!! Amazing buy! No complaints honestly except the balls are mega hard...which that’s a good thing and with every massage product. Also I weigh 160 and laid on this sucker for my rib cage. I am very pleased! 🙂
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer c.wigz1892

customer_reviews.title: My new BEST FRIEND --- a portable massager
customer_reviews.text: I can bring it anywhere at home and in the car. It is always there when I need it....hahaha!!! Very easy to use just a plug and play. It's small but a very strong massager. Sometimes I even have to lower the level even though I am used to hard massages before quarantine. I can feel it hitting the knots on my neck and shoulder and gives me a relief after a few mins. It has a set timer so you can't run it too long and just in case you fall asleep with it you are safe. I use it everyday and night or whenever I need to relax a little bit!!! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: It messages the tight muscles and relieves the tension.
customer_reviews.text: This product helped me with my lower back pain. It soothed the kinks in my back. I have very bad lower back pain that It was affecting my posture due to the pain, one night I used the messages for an hour and the next day the pain was relieved, the muscles in my back and waist feel more relaxed and now it is easier for me to move around. I now make it a habit to use it an hour every night and I feel much better that it allows me to exercise because the pain no longer stops me. I would definitely recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Michelly Garcia

customer_reviews.title: don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: While it works well for pain relief, getting it to stay working is the problem. Not only does it turn off in a measly 15 min but 99% of the time the thing won't turn on at all due to the location of the connector and its terribly weak connection strength design. If I could glue it together and have it work 100% of the time it would be a 5 star item. But since it only works 1 out of 100 times I click the button due to that short cord coming unplugged from the longer one ALL.THE.TIME. its a zero star device. If it doesn't massage then its just a very hard uncomfortable pillow.
customer_reviews.author: MICHLIS

customer_reviews.title: Loose plug; didn't work well for me
customer_reviews.text: I could not get comfortable using this -- no matter how I moved it around on my back, it did not make it feel better and was not comfortable to use. I also had a concern about the plug being very loose where it connected to the main unit -- worried it would fall out easily. Had to return.
customer_reviews.author: KarenT

customer_reviews.title: Very relaxing, effective, and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I found this massager very effective and very convenient to use. I have a muscle stiffness problem due to prolonged daily sitting routine so I decided to give it a go. I have not used it for long but so far it is working very good. It gives a very relaxing massage and comes with a plug so that one can use in vehicles too. The heat option provides more comfort. Overall, I am highly satisfied with this massager.
customer_reviews.author: A Khan

customer_reviews.title: Deep tissue massage at home
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product out of honest desperation. As someone with severe anxiety, my muscles stay pretty tense- as you could possibly imagine that causes a good deal of back, shoulder, and neck pain. Getting professional massages at this time is just a bad idea even if they were affordable for the long term. As it is, I had no relief from the tense pain beyond pain relief patches(work like a charm) and anti-inflammatory medicine. This massager heats up and works the muscle where you feel it needs to! All-in-all a great buy I'm very happy to have at home.
customer_reviews.author: Cutie

customer_reviews.title: A Great Gift to Anyone
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for a friend, and I've heard nothing but good things back. The few times I've used it, after just 5-10 minutes I felt much less tense in my neck, and my back felt a lot looser. The only minor problem we've had with the unit was the power cord tends to fall out, we simply added electrical tape around it to better secure the connector in, and it works flawlessly. The car adapter was a great addition too!
customer_reviews.author: Cory

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: It worked okay while it worked. It was good at getting the muscle spasms loose in my back. However, do not waste your money. Within a couple months of conservative use the fabric in front of the plastic massagers started to rip. It then finished ripping exposing the plastic. At this point using the thing is a hazard as it will pinch your skin and twist it relentlessly. You really might as well throw your money away. It started ripping like it did shortly after the return window closed, funny how cheaply made junk from amazon does that.
customer_reviews.author: Cody

customer_reviews.title: So far its doing good.
customer_reviews.text: -FIRST 24HRS REVIEW OVERALL IS A GOOD MACHINE, IT DOES RELIEF SOME PAIN.. IS IT WORTH THE $42+ PROBABLY NOT. CABLES DO KEEP DISCONNECTING ALL THE TIME( YES, YOU CAN TAPE IT..BUT.. WHY SHOULD YOU) OTHER THAN THAT, HEAT LEVEL IS GOOD(WARM) IT DOES OFFER DIFFERWNT STRENGHT OPTIONS SO YOU CAN ADJUST IT TO YOUR LIKING.. SO OVERALL YES IT DOES WHAT INTENDED BUT FOR THE PRICE OF $42+ AS OF TODAY.. COULD BE MUCH BETTER MADE.
customer_reviews.author: FERNANDO ESTRADA

customer_reviews.title: Heat Doesn’t work well
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my boyfriend for Christmas, it arrived fast and the massager part works well and feels great, however the cord becomes unplugged easily and needs to be plugged in to work and the heat function barely works. Would be a great product if heat function was better.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Menize

customer_reviews.title: My back finally feels great!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical, but this has been a great purchase. While laying on by back, I slid this puppy underneath and gradually got a full body massage. So glad it plugs into the wall, much easier than messing with batteries. It’s got just enough pressure for me (basically a novice to massages) and the heat is perfect for loosening all of my tense muscles. I used it after a long run with a thin towel on top (because sweat) and was so relaxed afterwards. Would absolutely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: F. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Everything was good at first , using it the first couple days I started to really like it but then one day after using it for 3 mins it left a welt / burn looking mark on my back and I have no idea how it happened it’s like it dug too deep and started eating me haha joking but not really cause I won’t use it again due to that. If I had to make a guess I think it blew a blood vessel . Either way was a good product until then so if you use it be careful the pressure you put onto it .
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Papillon Back Massager with Heat,Shiatsu Back and Neck Massager
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 98 yr old Dad. He suffers from back, neck, and shoulder pain. It's not easy for him to use. Getting it placed where he wants it and staying there is a challenge at times. I will be looking for something that's easier and more flexible for him to use. He does find relief when we find a way to place it so he can use it awhile before it slips.
customer_reviews.author: mtchan

customer_reviews.title: Would Not Power On For More Than A Few Seconds
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for 2 days. Then, it would only power on for a few seconds. Power cord enters the device in the back. To use it on your back, you have to position the massager between the back and a chair to hold it in place. This puts pressure on the power cord. My guess is this damaged the cord. I am no expert, but if the cord entered the side of the device, this might alleviate the problem. In all fairness, I must say that in terms of massage, it was the best massager I have ever purchased. Just wished it had lasted for more than 2 days.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Not great if you have a small neck, plug comes undone every 5 seconds, fabric ripped
customer_reviews.text: I'm a small framed person, I guess I have a small neck.... This doesn't even hardly reach it. I'm guessing if you have a large neck this would be great. cord comes unplugged barely touching it, had to tap it together. Fabric has ripped after only a few weeks of owning it. Does an ok job if it was better made. A remote would be nice so you don't have to reach around behind you to keep turning it on.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great massager for neck and shoulders.  A++++
customer_reviews.text: Great massager for neck and shoulders. I’ve been doing lots of gardening lately and my neck and shoulders are so sore. I decided to purchase this massager and I’m glad I did! The pressure is the perfect amount. I just put it on the back of the couch, lay into it and relax. Not quite as good as a professional massage, lol, but a lot cheaper!! Highly recommend. A++++++
customer_reviews.author: Susan L. Miller

customer_reviews.title: A few uses and it's useless
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for my wife. She has a bulging Disc in her neck. She only used it a few times in the last two months. Said The cord easily comes unplugged and was a nuisance. So hear I lay with my neck hurting plug this bad boy in and nothing. Lights up but no movement. Feels like one of the balls just free spins with your hand and Other feels tight to move. So two months used a few times and broken, of course. So I would try another one and leave this one alone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shuts off but otherwise nice product
customer_reviews.text: The Good: Does a great job massaging your neck or back or other areas. Seems to be well made. The Bad: Shuts off randomly. Starts in heat mode so you have to hit power button three times to get heat off. They should make it so you have to hold down the power button for a few seconds to shut off. Since it is often under your back, pressure from your body can make it shut off.
customer_reviews.author: rlovelace

customer_reviews.title: AC adapter (110-220V ) and Car adapter (12V DC)
customer_reviews.text: My job involves sitting at a computer for the whole day, and many days at the end-of-day I get severe pain in the back and neck. I decided to give try to this massager as this was not very expensive and had good reviews. So far this massager is really working great. It comes with both AC adapter (110-220V ) and Car adapter (12V DC), so I can use this in my car as well. Now I use this almost every day and very glad that I bought this.
customer_reviews.author: Rumi Ved

customer_reviews.title: Time to relax
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this back massager, I have been using it the whole week for 15 minutes on my lower back and 15 minutes on my shoulders and I feel less tense from my back since I been working a lot from home, sitting most of the time in front of my computer I really needed something like this to relax my back.
customer_reviews.author: Naomi L

customer_reviews.title: Okay but expected better
customer_reviews.text: Well... bought this in Sept of 2019. It’s now almost exactly a year later and the motor on this this makes it feel more like a back scratcher at the highest speed. I guess I can’t expect it to last forever but my last one ended up working for at least two and a half years so I expected more. Three stars because it did help to alleviate migraines caused by muscle tension but the other reviews are right when they say it can come unplugged if you move only slightly wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lower back and neck pain relief
customer_reviews.text: This massager is so handy. I was depressed by this pandemic that we have to wfh till further notice. I live in an apartment with my roommate, so I have to work in my bedroom on my small desk. Without the good office supply, I got neck pain quickly. This product definitely helps a lot. It gives you a press and also warms your muscle to help relief your tension. The 3 modes give a wide selection. I like how the red balls moving, very creative. Plus, you can take it with you when traveling. Easily attach it to the car seat. Use it for neck and lower back. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Daria

customer_reviews.title: wire keeps unplugging itself
customer_reviews.text: the main problem with this item is that the cord on it comes in two pieces which are not a tight fit. if you move around at all or try to readjust the position of the massager, the cord pulls apart and shuts the massager off. its basically a pain in the neck to try to work with. but if you lie perfectly still once you get it to turn on, its ok. i wish it were made with a better wire design. would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Susan N.

customer_reviews.title: A total relief at the end of the day
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Back Massager one week ago because of a lower back pain which i have everyday, along with some stretch exercises and the massage on lower back, i am feeling great. Not only on lower back, i also use on my neck, waist and leg. Very easy to operate, It has the heat light which is great. Sometimes i forget to turn off, but it has an overheat protection which is great. High recommended
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Alberto Menezes

customer_reviews.title: Kinda rough.
customer_reviews.text: It's hard to relax when you can't lean into this thing. Maybe I don't have deep enough tissue for this. If I sit in just the right way it cam be enjoyable but it's honestly kinda rough. Felt like it was bruising me. The settings didn't do much to hinder that problem either. I only recommend if you like that deep, rough tissue massage. Otherwise it may be painful.
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: I like my old one better.
customer_reviews.text: I thought I was getting the same as my old one. Not the case, I wanted one to just work when I turn it on, not give me all the pausing and who knows what it is doing. The cover on it is bad, snagged in just a very short time and looks like it is going to wear thin very shortly. Not a happy purchase for me.
customer_reviews.author: Sharron K.

customer_reviews.title: A lifesaver...
customer_reviews.text: I had backpain so bad I could barely sit up at my desk for weeks, and this has helped me feel so much better. I use it in my desk chair when my back starts hurting too much and it helps immensely. It heats up really nice and with it trapped between my back and the chair I can press it as hard or soft as I like.
customer_reviews.author: megalodon

customer_reviews.title: Do yourself a favor and just buy a decent one
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace the one I had from a different brand, and wish I'd spent a little more for a better product. This one does not give deep enough pressure and gets hot if you use it more than a few minutes. Waste of money, just get one in the $40 range that actually works well.
customer_reviews.author: Angel A

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t Contour well
customer_reviews.text: It just does not contour well. It’s uncomfortable to use. Hate to give bad reviews, but this one was not for us.
customer_reviews.author: Cyr

customer_reviews.title: Finally relief!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this massager 5 or 6 times in the short period that I’ve had it. I suffer from multiple musculoskeletal issues. This thing can be used on your back, shoulders, arms, legs, and even feet. It may be small but it’s powerful. I’ve purchased many massagers in the past and nothing comes close to the relief I get from this one.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Great Product and Great service
customer_reviews.text: My wife has constant muscle pains. This is a great massager. I had a problem with the one originally sent and the company was very fast and great in solving my problem. This is the fastes and best service in the industry. I would recommend this company and this massager for anyone in the market for a heated portable massager. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Uncle Karl in Las Vegas

customer_reviews.title: literally use every night
customer_reviews.text: I have sciatica. I use this every night under my leg. The heat is extra soothing. The massage is strong enough to give relief to help me sleep. I take this with me everywhere I may be staying. I will never be without one of these. If and when it wears out I will be reordering. So far the outer case and netting have stood up to nightly uses. This replaced a brand that the netting wore right through in a few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Fancy Pants

customer_reviews.title: Good for price
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this to help with back pain during pregnancy. Very happy I purchased it because it acts just like someone rubbing my back with heat, just had to turn it upside down. There is no vibration so it’s baby safe, it doesn’t get too hot but you can tell there is added heat. Only downfall with this device is that the power port disconnects way too easily which hits it off, it’s a design flaw but now a deal breaker just inconvenient.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Hanchey

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: I've been toting it back and forth from home and work. I'm going to purchase a second one. Fantastic on my back while sitting at my desk all day. At night I get sever leg cramps in my calf. I've been using it on that and it has given me so much relief. I bought one for my mom and I'm getting a second one for myself so I have one at home and one at work.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Branum

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality, Works Good on pain
customer_reviews.text: Had a problem with my first order and customer service of papillon took care of it right away. This massager is great. I have sciatica and this massager really helps relieve the pain. Love the rotating forward and backward switch. If you have chronic pain, of any sort, this massager will really help to give relief.
customer_reviews.author: M&T

customer_reviews.title: Impressed!
customer_reviews.text: So I ordered this thinking it probably would help a little with the tension I carry in my shoulders and neck but didn’t have high expectations at all. I was SO surprised. I opened it up, plugged it in and with in minutes had pain relief I haven’t had in forever. I’m super impressed with this product and the price. It was packaged well, easy to use, and would make a great present. I’m literally using it as I type this out. If you’re skeptical about buying, don’t be! This is totally worth your buck!
customer_reviews.author: Jh2k10

customer_reviews.title: Feels like a masseuse kneading the area— terrific for my low back pain.
customer_reviews.text: This is FANTASTIC! I have sacroiliac damage and I finally have relief between steroid joint injections. Although you can’t sit on the device, I position it on my lower back with a pillow propping it and I lay on my side and tilt slightly on to the device and it is such relief, feels exactly when my husband kneads then area but I can get the beefing for as long as I want— my husband usually stops after a few moment. This is fantastic with or without the heat. So thankful I found this item.
customer_reviews.author: JerseyMom

customer_reviews.title: Pain and stress relief
customer_reviews.text: I work from home 3 days a week and i sit at a desk all day during those times. Once an hour its great to take a quick break from what im doing and use the massager on neck and shoulders. Its instant relief and refreshing. At the end of the work day i definitely notice a difference. I don't feel as physically tired or aching.
customer_reviews.author: doug huskey

customer_reviews.title: Helps me relax
customer_reviews.text: Has helped me so much. I suffer from fibromyalgia and I get BAD spasm where it's even hard to breathe. I wish I could lean on it. LOL, IT hurts don't do that. It has helped me fall asleep. I wish I could get more into the neck area where I get a lot of stiffness. I gave one of these to my brother in law and my sister uses it a lot. Feels nice when massaging the head when you have headaches believe it or not. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Would be 5 stars is the plug was in a different spot
customer_reviews.text: You can chose between an electric socket or a car charger, but they put where I can unplug up way too high. It literally comes out EVERY SINGLE TIME I try to adjust it and out it into the right spot. I am in excruciating pain and now I have to get back up and replug in the machine
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Great option in between professional massages..
customer_reviews.text: Well, it is April 2020 and we are in lockdown due to COVID-19. I try to get professional massages regularly, otherwise I'm in a lot of pain. I have chronic neck pain and I get headaches. This is awesome and does the trick! Just plug it in (not wireless), lay down and let it do the work. You just adjust your head/neck into a position that works for you. I liked it so much I sent one to a friend who is also in pain, she loved it too!
customer_reviews.author: S S

customer_reviews.title: Bought for my husband!
customer_reviews.text: My husband complains of neck and back pain so I bought this for him as one of his birthday presents. WE love it! Incredible massage capabilities. Super strong pressure. Great heat. We use it on our feet, legs, neck, back and hands. 😍only thing I wish is that the cord “snapped in” when plugged in to the massager because it has fallen out a couple times.
customer_reviews.author: JessGans

customer_reviews.title: Good but mesh doesnt hold up
customer_reviews.text: A+ for pain relief and it heats up. However, the mesh around the back massager doesnt hold up unfortunately. If you dont care too much about that then, go for it otherwise, Im not sure how much longer this will last. Ive only had this about a couple months and only use it on occassion just for reference.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Great for a stand in masseuse
customer_reviews.text: Since we are still in a “stay at home” order, I decided to treat myself to a massager. THIS IS GREAT. I love deep tissue massages and this really gets in there and helps soothe my tight muscles. The balls also warm up which helps a lot! I’m considering purchasing another one for my dad for Father’s Day!
customer_reviews.author: Emanuel

customer_reviews.title: Painful
customer_reviews.text: So the reason I give it a 2 is because it is built well, but that's pretty much all the pros in my opinion. This feels good for one spin and then all the sudden it digs into you and pinches you. I tried to maneuver it in many ways and it just doesn't work. Maybe some people enjoy being in pain, but I don't. Also; this did not help my pain...It actually made it worse.
customer_reviews.author: D. Sink

customer_reviews.title: Awesome gift idea
customer_reviews.text: It works but be careful when getting really comfortable lol I used it longer than I should have and wow was I sore. But it works beautifully and I really do recommend it as a gift more so it’s for anyone man woman and teen. Enjoy your purchase :)
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Ponce

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: This is not a good buy to bulky and hurts when you try to use this. The price was to expensive for the product I was offered a gift card from amazon and it was not accepted there for my review on this product is do not waste your money on this product very disappointing to big and bulky not comfortable at all.
customer_reviews.author: Flor 💐

customer_reviews.title: Would gift!
customer_reviews.text: With social distancing, I've skipped my monthly massages in order to stay safe. This massager is a real relief! It does grind a little if you're laying on it, which is how I recommend using it, as your weight will give you the pressure you need. I use it on my neck, my shoulders, my back, my let's, and calves. It's easy to move around, and the cord is very long. I'm a tense mess, and it works great for me!
customer_reviews.author: Funsies

customer_reviews.title: Well it's not good
customer_reviews.text: Like others say, the power cord is an issue.I was thinking that it shut off but it was power cord which is out. Fabric doesn't seems to be very sturdy. I feel the noise of the motors is on the higher side. Though speed and heat effect is good. Power button doesn't work in first attempt.
customer_reviews.author: Ashu Sharma

customer_reviews.title: Not a well made product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in December, and it took 2.5 months for this thing to be completely unusable. Outer meshing started ripping about a month in then within another month the inner mesh ripped. On top of that, the cord won’t stay connected if there is any tension. Would love a refund
customer_reviews.author: JB
